properties.name: hkjc-org.web.security.admin-endpoints
properties.description: Endpoints that require the ADMIN role to access

properties.name: hkjc-org.web.security.unsecured-endpoints
properties.description: Endpoints that have no security requirements. Default value: /public**

properties.name: hkjc-org.web.security.user-endpoints
properties.description: Endpoints that require the USER role to access
